formatDescription: Tilt Brush files are outputs from the Open Brush software and Google Tilt Brush application (now discontinued), which allows the user to create digital paintings in virtual reality rendering a 3D image. The format has a prepended header and the format's zipped contents contain information about brush strokes, an array of models that can be imported into the sketch and a metadata.json file. This format is a container format currently identified with a binary signature.
provenanceCompoundName: Digital Research Alliance of Canada - FRDR / Alliance de recherche numérique du Canada – DFDR
